website_summaries.verdict: Choose them if budget is your top concern and you don't have the need for a large, pricey set – otherwise, they may not fit all of your needs.
pros: A budget-friendly 4-piece kit with straight and 90º snap ring pliers
Comes with a soft storage case with handle
cons: Not as versatile for various uses as others we considered

customer_reviews.title: They were ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I know these had some pretty poor reviews on here, but the set I got didn't have quite as many issues with it as others had. So, apparently it is a gamble when you order these. You might get a good set and you might not. But even on the set I recieved, I can tell the quality is far from good. The tips are not perfectly lined up and they actually appear to be tapered in diameter. So, I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent tools!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality for such a low price. I had a tool from a different manufacturer. I had to return it because I tried for two days off and on, to get the circlip off. Finally I purchased these tools. This is a properly designed and manufactured too. lt literally took me one second to get the circlip off in a recessed area that was hard to see or reach. For less money for the kit of four tools in a neatly designed and well made carry case than the one previous tool. I still can't believe it. Get your set before something changes!!
customer_reviews.author: howard newsome

customer_reviews.title: Superbly made and finished
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how HIGH the quality is on this snap ring plier set, especially considering the relatively low price. Made from high quality steel, the pliers are smoothly ground and operate perfectly. They are beautifully finished and have red plastic handles. The pliers come with a very nice carrying case. The pliers also have a very large opening range on the jaws: Straight pliers open 4 cm; bent pliers open 3 cm (because tips are bent, making them shorter). I highly recommend these pliers.
customer_reviews.author: BobWet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for $20
customer_reviews.text: While these aren't $200 Snapon snap ring pliers they are still pretty good. They sure do beat those cheap Harbor Freight snap ring pliers. The only complaint I'd have is the handles are super sticky as if the material isn't cured all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they work better than the one I bought at the parts store at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a decent set. I bought both sizes figuring I'd cover all the bases but after looking at them the 2 sizes are almost the same. I measured them w calipers thinking I was crazy. The .50 is closer to .55 and some of the .63 are larger too. And the straight external plier in the .63 set is actually way off (last pic)
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set Of Snap Ring Pliers
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed to use this for a single job, so I bought this set which was relatively inexpensive. I think they are a good set and am glad to have them in my toolbox for the rare times I might need them. I can recommend them for light to general use. I can't say for sure how long they will hold up, as I will not be using them very much, but they served my purpose and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Solid Snap Ring Pliers Set.
customer_reviews.text: I rebuild manual transmissions and differentials and this has been great for both internal and external snap rings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Franklin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Tool Box Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Motorcycle and small engine repairs will be easier with these tools. I was able to rebuild the hydraulic clutch slave and master with the help of the snap ring plyers. Even with same day delivery fee, these are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Carolan

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken tips
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, these are not made to hold up in a busy shop environment. I use just one out of this kit to do compressor work on hondas. Within2 weeks the tip bent and finally broke off. Really soft metal. Luckily still had my trusty Snap-On to complete the job. I would buy for home, but not for busy shop work.
customer_reviews.author: Sardond

customer_reviews.title: Know the tip size you need
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Tips are larger diameter and not prone to breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: works great for small snap rings
customer_reviews.text: I use my set for power tool repair. I like to get inside gearboxes and stuff, check the bearings, the grease, etc. These tools work great so far. That said I've only used them a couple times. Great value for what you pay. Seem well enough made
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Doe

customer_reviews.title: Decent, Does the job with a lil rework
customer_reviews.text: needed to remove some retaining rings and found that the pins were a bit too big for the holes in the retaining rings. they are std rings. had to file the pins so they would fit in the rings. Also the pliers are a bit sticky as in the pliers sorta jam up when in use and sometimes dont spring back . Purchased mainly for occasional use. They work but would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: DandMJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These things saved me so much time and trouble after trying to ghetto rig a bunch of stuff I got here on Amazon and found these save me so much time on my job I needed them for
customer_reviews.author: paul wall

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Tools are crafted great. They got the job done. The carrying case is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great set of snap ring pliers. I don't use them daily, but when I need them, i need them to be pretty sturdy and these fit that bill. Case is an excellent added bonus and looks pretty slick in my toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: 100% best pliers I've found of this kind. Very sturdy, doesnt deflect and grips the rings well.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Decent price. Good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: So far they've helped take off a couple snap rings but they feel well made and not brittle. Easy to use. And easy to store away
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The thicker set is too big for small automotive and household split rings. For general homeowner use, the smaller set would be better.
customer_reviews.author: sithee

customer_reviews.title: Next time I will spend a little more.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made cheaply, actually bent the tips the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: These work good and for I payedfor them their is nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Victor D.

customer_reviews.title: Works to get a Honda AC Compressor Clutch off
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine and had enough reach to help get a Honda CRV compressor clutch off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: The pliers are strong. They did not work for me. They are a bit short for Euro diff.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great qaulity for price
customer_reviews.text: lightyears better than my modular thin harbor freight ones. I actually bent the hell out of the harbor freight so bought a pair of these and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: dspot

customer_reviews.title: Work for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to hold up with smaller snap rings. Have used it for a couple of bigger ones. They do NOT work. The tips bent fairly quickly. Not a snap-on quality but also not a snap-on price.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto R.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I used these to remove a tough circlip on a transmission spring and it was easily up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Disco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SO much better than the interchangeable tip variety. Those always break/suck. These just work.
customer_reviews.author: mendo101

customer_reviews.title: Good tools but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: This tool set is great for small jobs honestly it's not made for heavy duty use and I can't see my self as a professional mechanic using this at the shop but it's great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Cheap Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Felt heavy duty, first time I used them two out of four snapped of the ends. Go with the Knipex, great tools and strength when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: E Sage

customer_reviews.title: Cheap metal. Not hardened
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind them bending the tips they are fine. Otherwise buy a better set. Not professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Lowtech Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. In fact it worked after breaking two other craftsman pliers. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K.

customer_reviews.title: Daily use
customer_reviews.text: Use them near daily in an industrial setting. I’m happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent tool.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap look and feel. Overall however they do get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Stylepoints

customer_reviews.title: ... pair snap ring pliers these are so far the best I ever had for the
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap pair snap ring pliers these are so far the best I ever had for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very useful in my workplace and definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Juan G.

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: These are solid you don’t need to worry about them breaking in your first try. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Really?? Astro!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never expect Astro products to be like that. So cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: great quality, just as good as my knipex but a portion of the price
customer_reviews.author: Cabbagehead

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for or some times less
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for or some times less
customer_reviews.author: David Butler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, seem to work well. Will see how they hold up with a little more use.
customer_reviews.author: SR_25

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the job I was looking to complete. Very pleased with the pliers
customer_reviews.author: Wesley A. Kottas

customer_reviews.title: Work real good soon I received them I took them to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Work real good soon I received them I took them to work and did repair on bearings its so stir and not slip. Rick's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the 4 broke with minutes. Taking apart ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 broke with minutes. Taking apart 8 barbells, two snap rings per side. Got through 5 barbells before the tips broke off both of them. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: ... got a chance to use this tool but just like any other cheap affordable tools made in China you ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got a chance to use this tool but just like any other cheap affordable tools made in China you have to be careful with your workmanship it does look like it's made from cheap Steel possibly you can break the tips on the 1st
customer_reviews.author: florin balalau

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in first impressions are great. Others have posted about the tips not being the correct size I measured mine and all were within a couple thousandths of 0.065
customer_reviews.author: MrBusses

product_meta.title: Astro Pneumatic Tool 94220 7" 4-Piece Internal/External Cr-V Snap Ring Pliers - 0.050"
product_meta.description: Size:0.050"Never compromised on quality, fully equipped with state-of-the-art technology - Designed with the user optimal experience in mind. International Renown, constantly modernizing powerful devices to meet the demands of the modern user.
feature_bullets: Includes: Internal and External straight and 90 degree bent pliers
Black & Polished Finish with Dipped, Non-Slip Handles
